title: A ‘Tripledemic’? Flu, R.S.V. and Covid May Collide This Winter, Experts Say
description: Flu cases are higher than usual for this time of year and are expected to soar in the coming weeks. Another virus, R.S.V., already is straining pediatric hospitals in some states.
dc:creator: Apoorva Mandavilli
media:credit: Jamie Kelter Davis for The New York Times
media:description: A young girl receiving a Covid test at Esperanza Health Center in Chicago in September.
